name: Hellwomb
description:
Short Horror themed experience made in the Raycasting Game Maker Engine for the E1M1 game jam.

Crawl through a nasty womb and blast some gnarly ghoulies.

Featuring:

  • Awful and Dated Control Scheme
  • Nauseating Sound Design
  • Eyeball Blistering Art
  • Five Ball Busting Levels
  • Made in less than 48 hours
